item.title: Loni add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Loni add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "For instance, on the planet Earth, man had always assumed that he was more intelligent than dolphins because he had achieved so much&mdash;the wheel, New York, wars and so on&mdash;whilst all the dolphins had ever done was muck about in the water having a good time. But conversely, the dolphins had always believed that they were far more intelligent than man&mdash;for precisely the same reasons." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Loni add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The Guide says there is an art to flying", said Ford, "or rather a knack. The knack lies in learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Loni add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "If we, citizens, do not support our artists, then we sacrifice our imagination on the altar of crude reality and we end up believing in nothing and having worthless dreams." -- Yann Martel

item.title: Loni add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbors, and laugh at them in our turn?" -- Jane Austen

item.title: Loni add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The more I know of the world, the more I am convinced that I shall never see a man whom I can really love. I require so much!" -- Jane Austen

item.title: Loni add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Loni add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Loni add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Loni add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Loni add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Loni add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Loni add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Loni add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Loni add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Loni add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "If the world were merely seductive, that would be easy. If it were merely challenging, that would be no problem. But I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day." -- E.B. White

item.title: Loni add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Quotation is a serviceable substitute for wit." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Loni add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Argue for your limitations and, sure enough, they're yours." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Loni add a quote by Dan Millman
item.description: "Your fears are not walls, but hurdles. Courage is not the absence of fear, but the conquering of it." -- Dan Millman

item.title: Loni add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep." -- Scott Adams

item.title: Loni add a quote by Leonardo da Vinci
item.description: "A painter should begin every canvas with a wash of black, because all things in nature are dark except where exposed by the light." -- Leonardo da Vinci

item.title: Loni add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Loni add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "There are painters who transform the sun to a yellow spot, but there are others who with the help of their art and their intelligence, transform a yellow spot into sun" -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Loni add a quote by Edgar Degas
item.description: "Art is not what you see, but what you make others see." -- Edgar Degas

item.title: Loni add a quote by Keith Floyd
item.description: "Watch a French housewife as she makes her way slowly along the loaded stalls… searching for the peak of ripeness and flavor… What you are seeing is a true artist at work, patiently assembling all the materials of her craft, just as the painter squeezes oil colors onto his palette ready to create a masterpiece." -- Keith Floyd

item.title: Loni add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Just because you're naked doesn't mean you're sexy. Just because you're cynical doesn't mean you're cool." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Loni add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "There are only two mantras, yum and yuck, mine is yum." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Loni add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "A sense of humor...is superior to any religion so far devised." -- Tom Robbins
